definition: Book of Deuteronomy/Fifth Book of Moses
old name for Shanghai 上海[Shang4 hai3]/surname Shen
to extend/to state/to explain/9th earthly branch: 3-5 p.m., 7th solar month (7th August-7th September), year of the Monkey/ancient Chinese compass point: 240°
life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots

sentences.english: We can look at the basic structure of Deuteronomy in a couple of ways.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以通過許多種方式來研究申命記的結構。
申命記》中出現了一位國王。

sentences.english: However, in Deuteronomy , there were exceptions to this prohibition of intermarriage.
sentences.chinese: 但是，在《申命記》裏，也有關於允許通婚的特例。

sentences.english: Deuteronomy 18:9 commands Israelites not to copy the toevah of other nations.
sentences.chinese: 申命記18:09命令以色列人不要模仿他國的禮教。

sentences.english: And he was expanding Deuteronomy chapter 7, that’s the place where God is saying to the children of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 他當時講的是申命記第七章。

sentences.english: A further theme of Deuteronomy is the emphasis on love.
sentences.chinese: 申命記另一個更深遠的主題是愛。
